text: ITNOW (formerly The Computer Bulletin) is a bimonthly magazine aimed at IT professionals that is published on behalf of the British Computer Society (BCS) and sent to all its members. The magazine was started with the title The Computer Bulletin in London in 1957. It is published by Oxford University Press for the BCS and is sent to more than 70,000 IT professionals. The editor is Brian Runciman. ==References== ==External links== * ITNOW website * ITNOW information from the BCS * Category:1957 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Bi-monthly magazines published in the United Kingdom Category:Computer magazines published in the United Kingdom Category:British Computer Society Category:Magazines published in London Category:Magazines established in 1957 Category:Oxford University Press Category:Professional and trade magazines
title: ITNOW
